description: In ultrasoft cotton interlock, these pants are perfect for the weekend or long-haul flights. Team yours with the coordinating jacket for a fresh take on the track suit.
fitting_details: Size medium has a 32" waist that expands to 39", a 12" rise, and a 27½" inseam.
Elastic waistband with an interior drawstring. Sewn fly.
Two front zip pockets. Back right zip pocket.
Contrasting stripe along the outer side of each leg.
Signature embroidered pony at the left thigh.
Model is 6'1"/185 cm and wears a size medium.
